# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appEvents | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appEvents ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appEvents)

-  GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appEvents 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appEvents

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appEvents#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appEvents
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appEvents#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appEvents#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appEvents#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppAppEventsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appappeventslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`
